alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:02PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sullivan and northeastern Wayne Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1202 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Callicoon, or 16 miles west of Liberty, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Damascus, Callicoon, Cochecton, Fremont, Jeffersonville, Fosterdale, White Sulphur Springs, Swan Lake, Stalker and Hortonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
